revision.text: ==Hadza== ===Etymology=== * {{suffix|hts|yamua|ko}} * Cushitic. Cf. Iraqw ''[[yaamu]]'' 'earth, ground, world' ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|hts|/ʔiamuʔako/}} ===Noun=== {{hts-noun|g=f}} (''Note: the form after a determiner is '''''{{l|hts|yamua}}''') # land, country ===Related terms=== * [[yamuabee]] [[Category:hts:Geography]]
